data.process: Call or email advice@solacewomensaid.org for information
data.clients: Women and girls over 13 who have experienced sexual violence
data.day: Monday 10am-2pm, Tuesday 10am-1pm and 6-8pm, Wednesday and Thursday 1-5pm, Friday 10-2pm
data.services: Helpline, advocacy, one to one counselling, body therapies, friends and family counselling, group support and therapy
